Plot: Maria Altmann, an octogenarian Jewish refugee, takes on the Austrian government to recover artwork she believes rightfully belongs to her family.
Title: Woman in Gold
Writer: Alexi Kaye Campbell, E. Randol Schoenberg (life story), Maria Altmann (life story)
Actors: Helen Mirren, Ryan Reynolds, Daniel Brühl, Katie Holmes
tomatoConsensus: Woman in Gold benefits from its talented leads, but strong work from Helen Mirren and Ryan Reynolds isn't enough to overpower a disappointingly dull treatment of a fascinating true story.
